main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Gonzales, Texas on February 6, 1952, at 1730 local time.
interesting points: The object was aluminum in color and normal flight behavior was noted., The observation lasted for about 15 minutes., It was reported that the object came in very fast, then slowed down to a consistent speed, and then sped up again., Witnesses described the sighting in terms of brightness, noting it was too bright as it hovered at about 8 inches altitude., The investigation revealed multiple sightings in the same area with some witnesses asserting the object vanished in a ball of fire.
